title: Captain Marvel - Official Trailer #2
body:
Captain Marvel’s second official trailer has arrived and finally reveals the answer to the question we’ve all been asking… why did Carol Danvers punch that Grandma?

The new film is a prequel to every MCU movie so far and the first Marvel superhero film with a female lead! Set in the 1990’s Carol Danvers/ Captain Marvel is a fighter pilot turned ‘most powerful hero in the universe’ who finds herself in a war between two alien species, the Kree and the Skrulls. Check out the full trailer below!

The character was first teased in the Avengers: Infinity War post-credits scene *SPOILERS* where we watched Nick Fury contact Danvers with a futuristic pager before turning to dust *END SPOILERS*. 

Captain Marvel is also expected to play a large role in 2019’s Avengers 4, however, we’ll need to wait for the first trailer (rumoured this week) before we can definitively say that. Anyway, here’s a new poster!

Captain Marvel is out in theatres on March 8, 2019, and stars Brie Larson, Samuel L. Jackson, Ben Mendelsohn, Djimon Hounsou, Lee Pace, Lashana Lynch, Gemma Chan, Annette Bening, Clark Gregg, and Jude Law.

Opinion: Personally, I found both trailers for Captain Marvel to be pretty generic. With that said, I’m incredibly excited for this movie as I’m a huge fan of Brie Larson; I’m excited about the character, for the return of Nick Fury, Agent Coulson, and the Guardians duo too. Also, that space fight scene!

Looking for more from me? Follow me on Twitter to keep up to date with my latest posts, video game related nonsense, or if you just want to say hey!

blog.name: msfangirlgonewild
blog.title: We're The Wild And Crazy Blogs!
blog.description:
The geek's name Jo-Anne from the Bay Area (San Francisco/Daly City) far, far away...Sex: bi-curious. Occupation: student, social/photo blogger, artist, 🏳️‍🌈friendly, SF Giants, Warriors and Niners fan, Falpal member, nerd, otaku and sadist. And yes...I'm a anime-aholic, cinephile-aholic, creative-aholic, wild-aholic...YES YES YES!!!

My list has everything: SNL, MAD TV, The Big Bang Theory, Conan O' Brien, Late Night with Jimmy Fallon/The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, The Late Show With Stephen Colbert, Late Night With Seth Meyers, The Late Late Show, Drunk History, Wet Hot American Summer, Sense8, House of Cards, Downton Abbey, Lost Girl, Sherlock, Coupling, all types of my fave anime/non anime series, MCU series, LOTR series, POTC series, Star Wars I-and on...all the things to die for, savvy?

blog.name: xxmisty
blog.title: Land of Coffee and Insanity
blog.description: Hello, I'm John/Mist! I'm a disabled transgender artist from the UK. I am the Mangle, the Mangle is me! My Art: Commissions are open! | Drop me an ask for more info and check my art tag to see some of my work! I greatly appreciate any support you can throw my way to help cover the cost of my medications and getting back on T which I've been unable to afford for the last 2 years My Patreon | My Ko-Fi Page | PayPal donations My Blog: Tumblr has decided boobs are yesterday's news so where once there were cosplays you'll now find mostly my fandom-related art, rambling and memetastic posts. Fandom slave to: Runaways, Spiderverse, MCU (and Marvel in general), Venom, Homestuck, Animal Crossing, Five Nights at Freddy's, She-Ra (SPoP and MOTU), Gorillaz, Splatoon, Arms, Doctor Who, Red Dwarf, Black Mirror, Guardians of the Galaxy, Deadpool, Cloverfield, Ashes to Ashes, Life on Mars, Pokemon, DHMIS, Hiveswap, Legend of Zelda, classic Sonic, 80s and 90s nostalgia, fun and games from the Highly Medicated Corner and nutty shenannigans with my betrothed beautiful fiancee and lovely partner Lucy :) About Me: I'm a transguy who enjoys cross dressing for cosplays, I live on a boat, I'm demisexual and am SO super lucky to have found my Moirspritmaterail, best friend, lover, soul mate, lovely partner for life ❤️💛💚💙💜 I am xX-Misty on FFnet and Fictionpress. More About Me why would you even click here??!) Moirspritmaterail tag Highly Medicated Corner Not Even Highly Medicated Corner

body:
Guys…

What if Robert Downey Jnr has just been hanging around the Captain Marvel set annoying Jude Law?


Better than that; what if RDJ has been trying to get Jude Law a role in the MCU for years now and Marvel were like ALRIGHT FINE HE CAN HAVE THIS PART JESUS CHRIST ROBERT


Even better than that; What if Jude Law’s character survives Captain Marvel and he and Tony Stark have a scene or 2 in Avengers 4?


So much better than that; what if RDJ plays a young Tony Stark in Captain Marvel? We already saw him in CACW


Guys. I’m dying here. GUUUUYSSSS

summary: While we are still unsure about the fate of all the MCU Heroes after the Thanos Snap, fans have a new (second) Captain Marvel...
caption:
While we are still unsure about the fate of all the MCU Heroes after the Thanos Snap, fans have a new (second) Captain Marvel trailer to enjoy. Also, a Shang-Chi film, becoming the MCU’s first Asian-led movie, is in development. Now, where’s the trailer for Avengers 4?

READ MORE:  Marvel Studios Releases Second Captain Marvel Trailer! Fast-Tracks Shang-Chi Film!

Captain Marvel Trailer 2 Breakdown – Easter Eggs & Things Missed

Mr Sunday Movies breaks down the new Captain Marvel trailer and reveals 10 things we missed in all of its awesomeness.

Marvel has just released trailer 2 for Captain Marvel, the next film in the series released just before Avengers 4. Including Easter Eggs, Ten Things Missed, the identity of both Jude Law and Annette…
